DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis is that a high fractional exhaled nitric oxide can predict the response to inhaled corticoids in chronic cough.
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Factors in Response to Inhaled Corticoids in Chronic Cough
DOC.criteria: chronic cough active smoker treated by corticoids during the previous month use of angiotensinconvertingenzyme inhibitor
